title: Ricky Martin gave us our first look at his gorgeous baby daughter
text:
Ricky Martin gave us our first look at his gorgeous baby daughter

Cape Town – Ricky Martin has shared the first picture of his adorable daughter Lucia.

The singer and his husband Jwan Yosef, welcomed their baby girl seven months ago via surrogate.

READ MORE: Ricky Martin and husband welcome baby girl

The 47-year-old finally showed her off to the world in an Instagram post. In the picture, Lucia is wearing cute bloomers and a bow in her hair while seated on her dad's lap.

Ricky captioned the picture: "La luz de mis ojos" which means "the light of my eyes" in Spanish.

His husband Jwan also shared the picture with the caption: "Baby Lucia Martin-Yosef being the light she is."

The couple also share 12-year-old twin sons Matteo and Valentino.
description: Ricky Martin has shared the first picture of his adorable daughter Lucia.
